text.textblock: The US Strategic Command Strategic Advisory Group: Closed Meeting

summary.textblock: The CINCSTRATCOM has scheduled a closed meeting of the Strategic Advisory Group.

date.textblock: The meeting will be held from 17 and 18 March 1994.

address.textblock: The meeting will be held at Offutt AFB, Nebraska.

further.textblock: USSTRATCOM Strategic Advisory Group, Offutt AFB, Nebraska 68113.

supplem.textblock: The purpose of the meeting is to discuss strategic issues that relate to the development of the Single Integrated Operational Plan (SIOP). Full development of the topics will require discussion of information classified TOP SECRET in accordance with Executive Order 12356, 2 April 1982. Access to this information must be strictly limited to personnel having requisite security clearances and specific need-to-know. Unauthorized disclosure of the information to be discussed at the SAG meeting could have exceptionally grave impact upon national defense. Accordingly, the meeting will be closed in accordance with 5 U.S.C. App II Para 10(d) (1976), as amended.

signjob.textblock: Alternate OSD Federal Register Liaison Officer, Department of Defense.
